questionnaire.description: The text 'questionnaire' in the page title

question.description: The text 'question' in the step header, right above where the prompt/question is shown

submit.description: The text 'Submit the Questionnaire' on the button shown at the bottom of the questionnaire

save_draft.description: The text 'SAVE DRAFT' on the button shown at the bottom of the questionnaire

original_question.description: The text 'original question' used in peer review steps

show_hide_text.description: The text 'show/hide text' for the button used in peer review steps

text_is_hidden.description: The text 'text is hidden' used in peer review steps

your_original_response....value: la respuesta original... este texto está sobreescrito por javascript
your_original_response....description: The text used as a place holder to show the original response in peer review steps

annotation.description: The text 'annotation' used in peer review steps

to_start_this_step_you_must.value: Para realizar este paso primero hay que enviar la respuesta del paso
to_start_this_step_you_must.description: The message to tell the student they must submit a response in another step before they can work on this step

link.description: The word 'link' used to notify the user that the text is a link

this_step_is_not_available_yet.value: Este paso no está disponible todavía.
this_step_is_not_available_yet.description: The text to notify the student that they can't work on this step yet because it is part of a peer review sequence

more_of_your_peers_need_to_submit.value: Algunos de sus compañeros deben enviar su respuesta para el paso
more_of_your_peers_need_to_submit.description: The text to notify the student that more of their classmates need to submit work to this peer review sequence step

you_will_then_be_assigned_a_response.value: Se te asignará un trabajo de un compañero para que lo evalúes.
you_will_then_be_assigned_a_response.description: The text to notify the student that they will be assigned to review one of their classmate's work

please_return_to_this_step_again.value: Por favor regresar a este paso en unos minutos.
please_return_to_this_step_again.description: The text to notify the student to try coming back to this step later

team_anonymous.description: The label to show student work is from an anonymous team

work_submitted_by.description: The label to show who submitted the work

you_have_successfully_reviewed.value: Completaste exitosamente la revisión del trabajo enviado por
you_have_successfully_reviewed.description: The text to notify the student that they have reviewed their classmate's work

prompt_from_first_peer_review.value: Acá aparecerán los comentarios de la revisión
prompt_from_first_peer_review.description: The text to notify the user that the prompt from the first step in the peer review sequence will appear here

work_from_a_random_classmate.value: Acá aparecerá un trabajo enviado por un compañero al azar
work_from_a_random_classmate.description: The text to notify the user that the work from a random classmate will display here

click_ok_to_save.value: Clic en 'OK' para guardar y bloquear este paso. El trabajo se guardará y no se podrá realizar ningún cambio. Para continuar trabajando en este paso, clic en 'Cancelar'.
click_ok_to_save.description: The text to notify the student to click 'OK' to save and lock the step

please_answer_all_the_questions.value: Por favor revisar todas las preguntas antes de enviar la respuesta.
please_answer_all_the_questions.description: The text to notify the user that they should answer all the questions before submitting

your_work_has_been_saved.description: The text that notifies the user that their work has been saved

your_work_has_been_submitted.description: The text that notifies the user that their work has been submitted

you_have_completed_this_step.description: The text that notifies the user that they have completed this step
